reviews.review:
Game is full of campers, who get every perk to make your gameplay as bad as possible and give you no chances to win. Both killers and survivors have issues. Mental issues. Most of the survivors are selfish and will leave you to die on hook, going through all 3 states at once. And devs..., who dont care about making this game balanced. Every item survivor can get will be destroyed after 3 seconds of use and you will find 5 pallets on the whole map.

Buy it only if you like raging.

Dear god this game is awful. Toxic people, constant bugs, one time i got stuck on a fence after jumping out a building and my teammates had to go get the killer so he could get me down, it was unendingly hilarious to see a bunch of wounded survivors beckoning Freddy Krueger towards their stuck friend.

Anyway I adore this game so, so much. I absolutely recommend you get it.

Por lo dem√°s bastante guay

This Game is the Absolute Worst I¬¥ve ever played. I`ve put way too much time in this Game. It brought me fun when playing with friends but playing alone or as Killer is a absolute Nightmare. The Community is one of the worst I ever experienced. Even Worse than Rainbow Six Siege or League of Legends. Everybody in this Game is toxic and plays really just things from the current Meta. Nobody plays this Game for Fun, they play it to bully people that are worse than them or to insult the ones that are better after the Game. As Survivor u run into 3 Mates that run the same build over and over again: Deadhard (or Sprint Burst), Borrow Time, Unbreakable (or Boon: Exponential) and a Killer that camps after he hooked somebody (either face camping or normal camping) and/or they only concentrate on getting one on another out of the game without respecting the fun aspect of the other players. 
The Killers and Perks (for both sides) are also completely unbalanced. The Nurse and the Spirit have been the 2 best Killers since release and a good nurse could handle up to 8 Survivors at the same Time while the Shape (Michael Myers) or The Pig ( Amanda from Saw) are so weak that they couldnt even handle 3 Survivors.
The Maps are also complete garbage there are like 4 or 5 killer sided Maps and the rest is complety survivor favored.  
And dont get me started on the Bugs. This game is also one of the buggiest I¬¥ve ever experienced. For excample is there a Bug that Pallets (which are used to stun the Killer) are not working properly. There is that the Pallet falls onto the Killers Head, but they do not get stunned or the version that they can hit you over a pallet or where you are on one side of the pallet, jump over hit, get hit while youre already on the other side and get teleported back and many More bugs just for the pallets. They "fixed" Pallets some time in 2021 and they were working properly but then 4 weeks later or so, there was a new patch ( on something different) and the pallet fix was completely gone again. Same thing happened with other popular Bugs. 

In Conclusion I would nobody recommend buying this Game. The  principle of this game is a really good and fun idea but with all the point above, this is clearly one of the worst games I've ever played. The Devs do not care about the State of the Game or anything about this Game as long as they make a lot of money with it (which they absolutely do)
i have a love hate relationship. (update for 2022) Alexa, Play I hate you, i love you

This game is so broken and unbalanced against the survivors. Killers literally spend all day camping you. With such a big player base (?) you'd think the devs would try balancing the game somewhat but it's a lost cause. It's fun but frustrating when every game is the same.

You spend most of your time dying or running, but you can't help but get addicted. It's a bit difficult to begin, but just keep playing and adding up perks and stuff, and it doesn't take long to start having some wins. Haven't played as a killer yet, but that looks so amusing.
Llevo jugando dias y no me canso.

Dead By Daylight is a game where 4 survivors work together against 1 killer in a survival game to the death. The game constantly gets updates so it's always fresh and very fun, even in the player betas where you can play as the brand new DLC killers absolutely free of charge!

Very fun game to play whit you're friends.

It‚Äôs nice to come back and see the game is still frequently getting updates, and it‚Äôs refreshing to hop into a game with friends to play it. There‚Äôs no obnoxious jumpscares and it is enjoyable to play, gameplay can occasionally feel a little bit of a grind and sometimes you can be waiting awhile for the overall wait times of games, but generally it is great.
The addition of DLC is nice, and it is refreshing to join new maps which give a varied difficulty to the gameplay. 

It‚Äôs worth picking up on sale, full price not so much - but if you have ¬£6 or fancy a multiplayer game with your friends I totally recommend it.

this game is fun for the first couple hundred hours. then as you get better you start to realize the fundamental problems this game has, such as a god awful community, content locked behind paywalls, boring gameplay, and so on. seriously this game has one of the WORST communities ive ever seen. and i grew up on COD and played overwatch.
This game is incredibly broken 24/7, yet i still go back to it daily if that tells you anything
